guide.title: Calendar guide
guide.intro: Everything you need to know to manage availability and lessons in one place.
guide.createSlotDesc: Click "Add slot" or drag on the grid to create availability for students.
guide.editSlotDesc: Select any slot to adjust time or duration. Use the toolbar to apply bulk changes.
guide.navigationDesc: Use arrows or keyboard shortcuts to move between weeks. "Today" jumps back to the current week.
guide.setupButtonDesc: "Set booking hours" opens the availability editor for full schedule control.
guide.maxDuration: Slots longer than 3 hours may be split for better visibility.
guide.noDuplicates: Avoid duplicate overlapping slots to keep booking simple.
guide.noOverlap: Overlapping lessons and availability are blocked automatically.
guide.helpIconDesc: Use the "?" icon in the top bar to open docs or ping support.

noAvailability.title: No availability set
noAvailability.description: Configure your schedule to start accepting bookings from students

errors.endBeforeStart: End time cannot be before start time
